dt-example.title: TableTools examples
dt-example.info:
TableTools is a plug-in for the DataTables HTML table enhancer, which adds a highly customisable button toolbar to a DataTable. Key features include:
* Copy to clipboard * Save table data as CSV, XLS or PDF files * Print view for clean printing * Row selection options * Easy use predefined buttons * Simple customisation of buttons * Well defined API for advanced control
